title: Quiet in game audio
body: Ok, so I have an issue where bot my in game and my client audio all of both are at 100% volume, however when I am in game it is significantly quieter than it was like a month ago, it's not like it is my equipment bc all other sounds work fine but I find myself having to turn my computer volume up, more than doubling or tripling my normal computer volume and having to turn it down when I return to client or do anything else, I was wondering if this was a bug or if volume was decreased.

replies.body:
Volume in League wasn't decreased across the board or anything so this must be related to your config settings or pc settings. Try giving your config settings a quick reset to see if that helps. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
